banditCount.description: Number of bandits available to choose from. Max action is this number -1.

decayRate.description: Rate that reward chance threshold increases per step that a bandit is chosen by an agent.

sampleResolution.description: Maximum value that can be returned by a bandit.

reward.description: The total reward each player has accumulated from the bandits across all steps.

agentIndex.description: The current agent's index within observation.lastActions.

lastActions.description: Bandits chosen by each agent on the last step. None on the first step.

thresholds.description: Probability values for each machine payout on this step. Hidden from agents at runtime.

action.description: Choice of bandit for the step (min bandit = 0, max bandit = configuration.banditCount - 1)
